author: RG Gonzalez
comment: OMG! If I open my Gmail my WhatsApp and my messages to respond on my zenwatch this keyboard is nowhere to be found. I have installed and uninstalled and still nothing and, on top of that you can't get your money back.. No 15 minute refund from Google. How can something so simple to install and setup not work as it's supposed to. All I want to do is reply with this keyboard and I can't.
title: Yeck

author: Casey Dudek
comment: Very hesitant 4 🌟 's , I couldn't get it to work at all on my G4, and now only works on my V20 with hangouts. I didn't find their support to be anything great when I contacted them either, though I did get a response to my email to their credit. This isn't a negative review, I like the app. I've had it for over half a year and it's just now working, but at least it's working. LG watch urbane 2nd edition

author: Puneet Shakya
comment: I have moto360 gen 2 and the app is enabled as per the instructions. The problem is the notifications are not being displayed in my watch even when there are messages being received in my phone. Sometimes it works fine and most of the time the notifications appear and disappear in a few seconds before i can view it. And sometimes I don't the get the notifications at all! Please fix the issue. Thanks.
title: Doesn't seem to work properly

author: Yunus Arnold
comment: App works well with huawei watch, would give it 5 stars if we could start a new chat like whatsapp without reply on current chat. Like start a new chat....
title: Good

author: GamingClips
comment: I payed good money for this app and it does nothing except take up space on my phone

reply.author: Dream Code
reply.content: Please have a look at the setup guide on dreamcode.it/qfw . if it doesn't help drop us an email we will be glad to assist you. thanks!

title: This app us a joke

comment: How i can refund my money?  This app is not working to me..  I see your guide in your website and do all of steps. But for me app is disabled and not change this status and not work..  Can you refund my money?

author: James Allatt
comment: Great app. I have both this and the text message from this developer and works without issues on my lg g5 and 360 watch. Love them to add outlook replys then this thing would be perfect

author: Christian Little
comment: Yes, its set to enabled, and yes the embedded keyboard is checked on. I'm using the moto360. And yes, I've also tried turning it off and on again.... No luck

reply.author: Dream Code
reply.content: Please watch this video to check if the app is set up correctly. if it is, please contact us. Thanks! https://youtu.be/5O9mv3TurbQ

title: Can't seem to get it to work. :-/

author: Danny Yu
comment: thanks,  I have been looking for a way to type on my smart watch for a while.  The setup is not simple, but once it is done, it works great.

author: Alice Morrison
comment: Not a bad app but it gets confusing on how to reply back to FB messenger through my Sony SM3.  I was able to figure it out because of the double notifications which the website addresses but otherwise it does its job.

author: nihal castelino
comment: On my mate 8 doesn't enable no matter how much I try

reply.author: Dream Code
reply.content: please contact us with more details on the issue, thank you

title: No reply sent

author: Sherali W
comment: Excellent app, workshop very well. Just wish that it supported more apps and the keyboards were a bit more intuitive.
title: Works very well

author: Jasley R
comment: All function and works!. But,its more great if you can adding individual notification sound features for every application that supported by this app. Thank you!
title: Love it!

author: Ben Blincoe
comment: Generally a great app, but ignores the DND status on my watch so impossible to silence when you need some privacy!

author: Sonny Pham
comment: Viber notifications aren't showing. Even when I've blocked the main app.    Update reply to dev: Yes I have enabled show notification content in Viber.

reply.author: Dream Code
reply.content: have you enabled show notification content in viber?

title: Huawei watch

author: Truckerbob Mypeterbilt
comment: Just barely installed so far good app let me use it more and I will leave a different review

author: Liang Tucky
comment: I would give it a 5 star if only the app can display my chat history.
title: Storage for messages

author: Wissam M. Khoury
comment: Nice idea - bad implementation
Not working on Huewai Watch

reply.author: Dream Code
reply.content: Hello, the app was probably not enabled or you were in the "double" situation. Please check the top item in the app on your phone says "Enabled" and that Quick's notifications are present (the one with keyboard support may appear under another). You can fix this adding WhatsApp etc to the Android Wear block list. Contact us if you need more help

title: Can't type anything

author: Rahied Laskar
comment: I'm not sure what's happening but it's not working!
title: Refund please.

author: Guilherme Favero
comment: Finally something that works to reply messages directly from wear. Using it on a moto 360 sport.

author: Skyler Tanaka
comment: Very intuitive and works perfectly, just as described!
title: Great app

author: Cem Kaya
comment: It would be great to be able to start a chat, otherwise great app.

author: Kevin Newton
comment: Good app but it needs a better keyboard

author: Aziz S
comment: Wonderful app. Does what it says

author: Benas Andriekus
comment: Can't make it enabled
title: Enable

author: William Evans
comment: This App and Flickkey make texting possible on your watch. It works like a dream with whatsapp. Since the team have mentioned I can block apps to avoid dual notification I don't miss any that come through this is a great app. Well worth the purchase. I changed this to a 5 star following the advice below I can now also see pictures from whatsapp on my watch. Really guys well done. This is great.

reply.author: Dream Code
reply.content: Hello William, please block the apps you use quick with (e.g. whatsapp) to get around this from the Android Wear app on your phone.

title: Essential App for Whatsapp On Wear

author: nascent nascentt
comment: I massively depend on this app. Once upon a time my 360 had powerful vibrations for every notification. Then an android wear update came along and stifled the vibrations. I was on the verge of selling my watch when I discovered this app.  I have all messages, reminders and calls on high vibration and everything else slightly softer.  I never miss a notification now. Thank you so much for this app.
title: Absolutely necessary. Works perfectly.

author: Gary Corbyn
comment: A few problems trying to configure but after fantastic support from  Michele it now works perfectly. Must have app for your watch, allows you to respond quickly to your messages using a keyboard.
title: Great app, excellent support!

author: Andrei Bădicu
comment: Indeed a great and useful wear app. Well worth it. The only reason why I cannot give it 5 stars is because it does not yet have the Romanian language. Please add it in! Then I will gladly change the rating to 5 stars.  Even so, I highly recommend this app if you have a wear device!

author: Douglas Rauda
comment: This app works EXACTLY as described and it's awesome.  Frequent updates and improvements. Developer is super responsive as well. Wish I could give it 10 stars.

author: Dan Regev
comment: The most practical addition to any wear watch. Can send messages and predefined messages in any language!
title: Perfect!

author: Yap Hock Heng
comment: Can't get the photo to show. Only sees a camera icon. Auto download enabled and is still not working.

reply.author: Dream Code
reply.content: please enable picture autodownloading in whatsapp, thanks!

title: Photo support

author: Giovan Pangku
comment: It works. Yes it needs improvements, but it works.
title: Why do people rate this app so low?

author: Keith Chong
comment: Being able to view the whole of Whatsapp conversations rather than just viewing through latest notifications.
title: Awesome but lack of one thing..

author: Bastian H. S
comment: I have enable the apps. When i type my response and sent it actually it's not sent the message anyway. Did i miss something?
title: Not sent response

author: Pawan Jangra
comment: It becomes disabled on its own.  I have to again open it & enable it.  Please fix this.  Rest is just awesome.
title: Great... BUT...

author: Sarah Williams
comment: This app is amazing, it makes me appreciate my Moto 360 so much more. I had some trouble getting it working at first and support was very quick and helpful. Turns out my phone had caching issues, so no problems with the app.
title: Watch is so much more functional

author: david Jimenez
comment: Using hangouts with Embedded. Keyboard will type but send button won't work. Help please or give me refund. I downloaded. Both wear messaged and quick for wear
title: Gear live

author: Björn von der Osten
comment: This app is great, finally I have more control over my messaging notifications! And being able to use a keyboard to reply is a great added bonus!
title: Perfect
